verbs.description: Tragedy after tragedy [V: is] unfolding along the border because of a decision by Trump and Sessions to prosecute undocumented immigrants at the border .
[ARG1: Tragedy after tragedy] is [V: unfolding] [ARGM-LOC: along the border] [ARGM-CAU: because of a decision by Trump and Sessions to prosecute undocumented immigrants at the border] .
Tragedy after tragedy is unfolding along the border because of a decision by Trump and Sessions to [V: prosecute] [ARG1: undocumented immigrants] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
